posts.post_content:
Posted By: Chris Mc
 I would like to pick up another O.J. (Brown's Champions) I am looking for a Authentic card,rebacked,skinned or trimmed is O.K. so long as the advertisement on the bottom is there and the picture is O.K. Creases, stains etc are fine. Lower condition is preferable as I am on a budget. I have Latham, Hudson and Caruthers. I have a few interesting things to trade or can Paypal or Money order. Thanks, Chris

Posted By: Ben Y.
Do you have any PCL cards to trade?

Posted By: Chris Mc
Sorry, The only PCL I have is a couple of 1947 Signal Gas. If you have a card I need please e-mail me a scan and price. Thanks, Chris
